com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.mail

Class MailContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.mail.MailContext

  • public class MailContext
extends Object
    Contains mail-related information for mail library elements.

    With a default configuration, a mail context is made available as an implicit object (by the mail context provider) and can be obtained by using a convenience method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MAIL_CONTEXT
      The name of the implicit object that is created by the mail context provider: "aluminum.library.mail.mail_context".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailContext(SessionProvider sessionProvider)
      Creates a mail context.

      • from

        public static MailContext from(Context context)
                        throws AluminumException
        Extracts the mail context implicit object from a context.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to find the mail context in
        Returns:
        the mail context in the context
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the context does not contain a mail context implicit object
